about_the_game:
A new version of this DLC (and the original Hardpunch game) is being rebuilt from scratch. The complete package will be re-released by the end of December 2022.
This DLC has It's an adventure RPG game extension.
The original game - Harpunch Sex Plague - is a Battle Royale game.
This game is in constant development, fixing bugs in the search for the satisfaction of those who buy this unofficial EARLY ACCESS.
CyberPorn Village introduces the player to a new dimension of the game. Finally, a series of events will be presented that resulted in the destruction of 90% of the population of humanity, transforming the survivors into sexual zombies. Hardpunch - our heroine - visits the only city that still maintains its futuristic structure, the last vestige of civilization. The story takes place a few years before Hardpunch's search for the spirit of Venus.
The main difference in this DLC lies in the challenging aspect of this third-person game:
The player needs to decipher a series of challenges in order to find the enigmatic Holofernes. The nefarious millionaire is responsible for destroying humanity with the libidinous virus he created. Exploring the city and solving the puzzles is the only way out. Most survivors must remain in an eternal quarantine. Very few people can leave during the curfew. Such a measure could guarantee the life and health of these people, preventing them from becoming mutant sexual monsters. All of this, because a large part of that population became sexual zombies. Mutant creatures desperately need to maintain a flow of sexual acts while producing energy. Such creatures can stay on the streets of the city. Because a group of scientists takes the opportunity to explore the sexual peculiarity of these survivors. Explore the city. Decipher the enigmas presented by the clone oracles. Find the hiding place and Holofernes and destroy it.
But be careful! Holofernes created the killer virus during the various experiments to clone the dead wife. However, in addition to producing hundreds of his wife's potentialized clones (including Hardpunch), Holofernes created several clones of himself.

The story revolves around the mysterious Holofernes (also known as Saklas). He is an immortal genius who after being traumatized by the murder of his wife. Then, using the knowledge acquired with the help of ancestral astronauts Holofernes dedicates his life to cloning his wife with the aim of recreating her. However, this is impossible. The result of this obsession was the involuntary creation of a virus based on the libidinous characteristics of the dead wife.
In a short space of time, a series of events end humanity:
1) 90% of the population dies. The survivors turn into sexual zombies (because Holofernes' wife was a nymphomaniac).
2) A cult arises around the image of the dead wife. These fanatics adore her as a goddess. She is called Venus.
3) The clones of the dead wife become humanity's only hope. Because some of these clones can emulate a hidden power that Holofernes' wife had. After all, he didn't know any mysteries around his wife Edna.

The player explores an open world in the third person. It is necessary to survive until the end. In other words, find the portal of triumph and cross it to transport yourself to a new world. During this challenge, it is important to collect items of all types (health, stamina, bladed weapons, etc.). There are no firearms in this future. Practically the weapons available are swords, knives, and shields.
After all, there are spoils. Dying humans are kept on platforms in order to provide energy. Whoever has the power to absorb through sex is supplied in these places. However, there will always be a creature protecting these posts. The main objective is to obtain enough sexual energy to activate the powerful Alive-Bomb Subverse that is hidden in the last level of the game. This machine could become the only hope for this world lost to nuclear cataclysm.

This adventure is an open-world game experience. You will have an entire apocalyptic world to explore, exploring items, and mapping your location while looking for what you need to survive. Take this opportunity to understand your limits. You will always be able to count on the help of your war companion.

Playing is extremely easy because you can use your computer's keyboard and mouse or you can choose a joystick. This game is for PC Windows and is not heavy to play. The interface offers a lot of gameplay information. In addition, you can count on the help of a complete inventory.

content_descriptors.notes: “The characters are practically naked or half-naked. Frequent nudity, because the characters live in an apocalyptic world where they survive with what they can. In addition, some characters absorb energy in brief sexual acts. The game has some situations of explicit and non-explicit sex. Sexual content is explicit or graphic. Presence of blood and violence using swords, katanas, and punches.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This version has many effects and particles. Requires attention to FPS performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, 2.67 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 2070 or Superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This version has many effects and particles. Requires attention to FPS performance.

short_description: The hardPunch heroine lives in a post-apocalyptic world where the goddess Venus is the cult object of the survivors. Humanity has become sterile. CyberPorn Village is the only city intact. The world has become horrendous, wicked, and extremely dangerous.
